metadata.title: CVE-2022-3550 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in X.org Server. Affectedby this vulnerability is the function _GetCountedString of the filexkb/xkb.c. The manipulation leads to buffer overflow. It is recommended toapply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of thisvulnerability is VDB-211051.

criterions.comment: xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
